DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective Registry : 1 . Monitor transfer ATI Neurostimulation System safety/clinical performance large number center post market phase 2 . Collect additional evidence support reimbursement clinical acceptance long term follow
DOC.brief_title: Data Collection ATI Neurostimulation System : SPG Stimulation Cluster Headache
DOC.criteria: Subject meet CE mark label cluster headache . Subject 's typical cluster headache bout last minimum 16 week , opinion Investigator . Subject agree maintain current preventive headache medication regimen ( change type , frequency dose except manage tolerability ) Study Enrollment completion Therapy Evaluation Period . Subject ability read , comprehend reliably record information require Protocol . Subject able provide write informed consent prior participation study . Subject change type , dosage frequency take preventive headache medication < one ( 1 ) month prior Study Enrollment . Per CE mark labeling : In opinion Investigator , subject bony facial deformity , inappropriate surgical anatomy facial surgery surgical area side plan surgery would prevent proper placement ATI Neurostimulator . Subject significant pain problem might confound study assessment opinion Investigator .
